#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(ic-dpi)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES )
add_executable(icdpi ConnectMgr.cpp PcapModule.cpp LvldbMgr.cpp main.cpp)

IF (CMAKE_COMPILER_IS_GNUCXX)
  SET (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-std=gnu++11")
ELSEIF (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
  SET (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-std=c++11")
ELSEIF (MSVC)
  # On by default
ENDIF ()

link_directories("/usr/local/lib64" "/usr/lib64")
target_include_directories (icdpi PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
target_link_libraries(icdpi PUBLIC "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}" pthread leveldb pcap)
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} ../../tms/tms)

set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} ")

#set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH Debug)
